title: Tick tock...
description: No matter how many mistakes you make or how slow you progress, you are still way ahead of everyone who isn't trying. Try more to suceed.

title: Please do something...
description: All things are difficult before they are easy. So, Start now.

title: Keep in mind...
description: Don't waste your time looking back on what you've lost. Move on, for life is not meant to be traveled backwards.

title: Do something and make your day
description: What you want exists. Don't settle until you get it.

title: Time flies...
description: The struggle your are in today is developing the strength you need tomorrow. Don't forget to bring goods for tommorow

title: Your first use of Listit
description: Today is the day that you downloaded Listit and trying to make it better everyday by feedbacking us.
